refentry.title: dumps differences of two DICOM files

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The gdcmdiff command line program takes as input two DICOM files: file1 and file2.

para.literallayout:
file1 DICOM input filename
file2 DICOM output filename
-m --meta Compare metainformation. Default is off. -t <n> --truncate <n> String values trimmed to n characters.

-h --help print this help text and exit
-v --version print version information and exit
-V --verbose verbose mode (warning+error).
-W --warning warning mode, print warning information
-E --error error mode, print error information
-D --debug debug mode, print debug information
